ygData.subject: Re: Speaking of +charisma items
ygData.msgSnippet: well the marshal would not talk to ya cos ya faction is either bad or neutral. kiss up to him and go kill some gobs and orcs...they go sweet talk him again.
ygData.messageBody:
well the marshal would not talk to ya cos ya faction is either bad or
neutral. kiss up to him and go kill some gobs and orcs...they go sweet
talk him again.



On 18 May 1999 mikejj@... wrote:

> From: mikejj@...
>
> Has anyone gotten a Leatherfoot Raiders Cap,
> I read on eq'lizer that it gives +10 charisma.
>
> Does it start in Rivervale with the Marshal
> who is the head of the Leatherfoot Raiders,
> because I can't seem to start this quest. He's
> the one in the alcove to the right of the
> Sheriff. Even if it doesn't start there does
> someone know the *exact* words to use to answer
> him?
>
> Or is the cap a loot item from the halfling
> bandit camp in Nektulos?
>
> mike
